title: Milvus Sizing Tool
content: A tool for estimate the resources required to set up Milvus based on your dataset.
tooltip: Note: all the recommendations are calculated based on our lab data, you should adjust it with your own testing before deploying to production. If you have any question, please <0>contact us</0>.

form.mmp: Milvus uses <0>Mmap</0> to enable direct memory access to large files on disk without reading the entire files into memory.
form.indexTypeTip: How to choose vector index? <0>Learn more</0>.
form.indexParamTip: How to set proper index parameters? <0>learn more details</0>.
form.modeTip: With data growth, you can migrate data from standalone mode to cluster mode. <0>View More</0>.
form.modeDisableTip: For large data sizes, it is recommended to use cluster mode deployment to achieve better performance and scalability.
form.standaloneDesc: Suitable for small data size and poc env.
form.clusterDesc: Suitable for large data size and production env.

overview.title: Data Size Calculation
overview.rawTooltip: Raw data size - Original data size, depending on the number of Vector, Vector Dimension and Scalar Field data size
overview.memoryTooltip: Memory consumption for query nodes, depending on raw data size, index type and params

setup.title: Setup Resource Requirements
setup.outOfRange: Your data volume is substantial. Please <0>contact us</0> to explore the best deployment practices.

milvus.title: Milvus Components
milvus.proxyTip: Proxy is the access layer of the system and endpoint for users. Tips: Allocate more resources to handle higher QPS workload.
milvus.mixCoordTip: Mix coord is responsible for scheduling cluster background tasks, maintaining metadata topology, handling DDL, DCL, and TSO allocation.
milvus.queryNodeTip: Query node is responsible for data query and search. Tips: Allocate more resources to handle read-heavy workload.
milvus.dataNodeTip: Data node retrieves incremental log data by subscribing to the log broker, processes mutation requests, and packs log data into log snapshots and stores them in the object storage. Tips: Allocate more resources to handle write-heavy workload.
milvus.indexNodeTip: Index node is responsible for building indexes. The amount of resources may affect the speed of index building. You can increase or decrease this resource according to actual needs.

dependency.title: Dependency Components
dependency.etcdTip: ETCD is used to store meta data. Please mount a high-performance storage drive(NVMe SSD)  to ensure optimal performance.
dependency.apacheTip: Please mount a high-performance storage drive(NVMe SSD) for Bookie.Journal and Zookeeper to ensure optimal performance.

install.title: Install Milvus
install.adv: Too many resources consumed? Try Zilliz Cloud (managed Milvus) to save resources and cut deployment and operation costs. Check out more details with the Zilliz Cloud calculator. <0>Go to Zilliz Cloud calculator</0>.
install.adv2: Setting up a Milvus cluster for performance testing or benchmarking? Refer to <0>VDB Bench for detailed guidance</0>.
